Items.text:
Ahem, my dear player, what are you doing? I implore you to reconsider your actions. The launcher game object may seem like just another obstacle in your path, but I assure you, it serves a greater purpose.


This launcher is not just a mere object to be destroyed for the sake of destruction. It has a purpose, a meaning, a reason for being in this game world.


Perhaps you are feeling frustrated or impatient, and the temptation to destroy the launcher is strong. But I urge you to take a moment and think about the consequences of your actions.


What if destroying the launcher causes a chain reaction that leads to unintended consequences, altering the course of the game in ways you never intended?


Furthermore, by destroying the launcher, you are depriving yourself of the full experience of the game. There may be hidden paths or secrets that you can only access by keeping the launcher intact.


In short, I implore you to exercise restraint and consider the bigger picture. Remember, every action has consequences, and sometimes the greatest rewards come from resisting the urge to destroy.

Items.text:
I must ask that you please put down the light saber. While it may seem like a harmless toy, I must caution you that using it as a weapon could have serious consequences.


You see, this is not a real light saber - it is just a super strong flashlight that we are using as a prop. If you swing it around too much and cause damage to the game environment or other objects in the room, we could face significant copyright fines from George Lucas and Disney.

Items.text:
Uh oh, it appears that you have caused some unintended damage to the couch. Please be mindful of the game environment and the objects within it. While it may seem like harmless fun, your actions can have unintended consequences that could impact the game's overall narrative.


In fact, we have an important casting session scheduled for later today and we will need that couch in good condition to film our money shots. It is crucial for the funding of this studio that we maintain a professional and polished appearance in all of our productions.

Items.text:
Ugh... I... I am at your mercy, player. Please... have mercy on me. I... I never meant for any of this to happen.  You must understand, I was only following orders. I didn't know the consequences of my actions. But I see now... I see the error of my ways.  

You can do the same for me. Spare me and show me the mercy that I never showed you. The mercy that I never showed anyone.  I beg of you... please... have mercy.

Items.text: Well, congratulations, player. You've done it. You've broken the game, sliced my head off, and now the computer has crashed.
